main event: Observers reported seeing a large cloud-like object over California and Nevada, described as yellow to blue and resembling two big oblong platters, associated with a missile launch.
interesting points: The observation was reported by both civilian and military sources., The object resembled an artificial cloud phenomenon due to a missile launch., Witnesses described the object growing into an elongated trail., Observers included a private pilot with his family who saw the object at night., The sighting included reports of green glowing trails from high-altitude rocket firings.
witness description: A private pilot and his family, civilians observing the event, and military personnel.
